name: Electrogene
description:
Electrogene is a puzzle platformer where you play as the genes!


Make you way throught all the puzzles and find all the batteries,
avoid all the spikes and place all the light bulbs back!


A lot of challenges on the dark awaits for you,
will you be able to return all the light bulbs?

Electrogene is a unique experience, you can also try the Survival mode if you dare!



Was this not enough for you? what about you make it yourself?!
Electrogene allows you to create your own maps!
Create them and share it with your friends!


Wishlist Electrogene now!
